item.description:
The River Fest is on again!! Great music all day long (noon to 6pm) on four stages and it's all FREE!! I'll be manning a community table for the Brazilian Cultural Center all day so come by and say hello and/or meetup with others.


Revolving along a one-mile stretch on the banks of the Charles River, the 29th annual Cambridge River Festival on Saturday, June 14, 2008 celebrates the city?s cultural diversity through music, dance, and the arts. Captivating people of all ages and backgrounds, nationally recognized musicians and visual artists will entertain at this lively outdoor celebration. Free to the public and produced by the Cambridge Arts Council, this summertime event brings the Greater Boston community together to enjoy the talents of performers and artists.
item.name: CAMBRIDGE RIVER FESTIVAL
